c74object.name: fl.window~
c74object.digest: Multiplies the incoming frame against a specified window.
c74object.description: The output length will match the input length.

entry.name: 0. /window [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the window type.
[0] - hann [1] - hamming [2] - triangle [3] - cosine [4] - blackman [5] - blackman62 [6] - blackman70 [7] - blackman74 [8] - blackman92 [9] - blackmanharris [10] - flattop [11] - rectangle

entry.name: 1. /size [double]
entry.description: Sets the size of the internal window. If set to 0 the window will be recalculated to match the input size (good for frequency domain applications. Otherwise an internally stored window is linearly interpolated to fit the input size (good for granular applications.

entry.name: 2. /sqrt [bool]
entry.description: Sets whether the window should be used directly, or the square root of the window.

entry.name: 3. /compensate [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the gain compensation used. off - no compensation is used. linear - compensate the linear gain of the window. power - compensate the power gain of the window. powoverlin - compensate by the power gain divided by the linear gain
[0] - off [1] - linear [2] - power [3] - powoverlin

entry.name: 4. /endpoints [enum]
entry.description:
Sets which endpoints of the window used will be non-zero for windows that start and end at zero.
[0] - first [1] - last [2] - both [3] - none
